title: lalitAmbikAm cintayAmyaham
sahitya:
lalitAmbikAm cintayAmyaham shrI guruguha pUjita parAmbikAm


anupallavi

 trilOka rAjnIm dIna rakSiNIm trikONa vAsinIm bhaNDa mardinIm


caraNam   kalA rUpiNIm kAtyAyanIm kanja lOcanIm kanaka mAlinIm 
pAlita mantriNyAdi samUhAm pashupati hrdAnanda kara mOhAm
